Package atg.portal.alert

Class Summary
AdministrationMessage This message bean extends the PortalMessage class for the purposes of adding properties common to all framework alerts messages.
FrameworkMessage This message bean extends the PortalMessage class for the purposes of adding properties common to all framework alerts messages.
GearMessage This message bean extends the PortalMessage class for the purposes of adding properties common to all Gear alerts messages.
GearMessagePublisher This class' purpose is to take care of all JMS initialization and to write the JMS messages, to the appropriate destination.
PortalMessage This class is the base class for all PAF message beans.
